hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "A Muslim eats in one intestine (i.e. he is satisfied with a little food) while a Kafir (unbeliever) eats in seven intestines (eats much)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُؤْمِنُ يَأْكُلُ فِي مِعًى وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: A believer eats in one intestine
